website_summaries.verdict: Mickey Mouse Clubhouse fans will be over the moon with this set of 6 plush characters. A great choice for little ones longing to join the gang.
pros: Set comes with all the main characters, including Mickey, Minnie, Donald, Daisy, Goofy, and Pluto
Soft and easy for little hands to grip
Reusable gift bag can be used to tote the gang from place to place
cons: Sizes vary somewhat from character to character
A handful of owners were disappointed by the size

customer_reviews.title: Missing character
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my son. The description says it comes with a Mickey, Minnie, Pluto, Donald and daisy but I did not get the Daisy. Instead they put in two Minnies. I requested a replacement describing why and they sent me the replacement quickly but I still did not get the Daisy. I think the overall quality is good and they are nice and soft just false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Ford

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to put in a Christmas tree, and I was worried about quality, because the price seemed too inexpensive. I was surprised at the quality when they arrived. Each is super cute and well made. I don't understand the reviews that's a the dolls fell apart. Unless you have someone pulling constantly out the door, I don't see how they would fall apart. I would definitely by these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product for my 2 year old granddaughter, however when they arrived I was shocked at the actual size and quality. They are smaller than 11” as described. They are more like 8””. I thought the box was empty when it arrived it was so light. Not worth $60, maybe half that amount. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tina cozby

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are not nearly 11 in more like seven maybe eight. I bought them so that I could get them to my daughter on our way to Disney and I still will but they did false advertise the size. Very disappointed with this company
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: No Daisy Included
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with TWO minnie's. A red one and a pink one, and no daisy. My two year old noticed in seconds. I'll be contacting for an extra.
customer_reviews.author: PAWS Rescue

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my son who is almost two! He’s in love with Mickey Mouse and has a plush toy of Mickey that he takes to bed every night. We sometimes let him watch Mickey Mouse Clubhouse so decided to buy these because he loved his other Mickey Plush toy so much. We were not disappointed! This was THE perfect Christmas gift! Pictured is him with all the Mickey Mouse plushies he got for Christmas❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Customer service not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I really love these but I got the wrong bag. The bag I received will not fit the beanies in it and we wanted it to carry them in. Contacted seller and have yet to hear back. Almost a week since I inquired about getting the correct bag.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: No Daisy sent
customer_reviews.text: Sent 2 Minnies and no Daisy! Disappointed since I really got this set for Daisy! We already had a Minnie and now we have 3 Minnies and no Daisy ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Great qaulity
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! Get the entire clubhouse gang in a cute little tote. My little child loves them!!!! These are the real deal with mickey mouse clubhouse tags and all.
customer_reviews.author: Phins4thewin

customer_reviews.title: Hot dog
customer_reviews.text: Hot dog hot dog hot digging dog! Baby shark do do do do do do do do do... my life
customer_reviews.author: atrunk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Both my 2 year old son and I love these plush dolls. They’re the perfect size for little hands. Not too big and not too small and they look exactly like the characters look on TV! The bag is nice for storing his little friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Disney stuffies
customer_reviews.text: Can I bought these for my grandchildren. They love them. Came in a nice Disney bag too.
customer_reviews.author: Squawmamma

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: They are very small and the bag is not the same as the photo, I do not agree with the price for me it is a scam😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Rosaura Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well I liked the gift for my daughter. I recieved 2 Minnie's in the package instead of one. And didn't receive a Daisy. That was the only disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mommy and son approved!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES them!! He loves the club house so much and this was just the most perfect gift for him!!
customer_reviews.author: marisol acosta

customer_reviews.title: Different Gift Bag
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to get the same gift bag that’s shown in the picture. When it arrives it was a different bag, it was a backpack instead of tote bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Me
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these. And the bag is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys and good value!
customer_reviews.text: These plush toys are the real deal. Perfect condition and size for toddlers. The large tote bag is a plus. Kept my grandchildren very busy and happy
customer_reviews.author: akm

customer_reviews.title: Six plushies!
customer_reviews.text: It was a bummer that the gift bag shown was not the one sent with the set. But my grandson absolutely loved getting them for his birthday today!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: I recommend another seller here that have a better size separate ...
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for the size .. I recommend another seller here that have a better size separate cost 10 $ each and are much larger I do not recommend this product at all I try to return 2 days after I buy it and the label was not available $ 70 thrown away!
customer_reviews.author: ortmariie_22

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing package! Great value for $ and comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing package! Great value for $ and comes with the bag for easy "put away"! My 2 1/2 year old loves it and I highly recommend!! Would make a wonderful bday gift!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer petersen

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Used them as tree decorations. My daughter loves Minnie and Mickey Mouse. Came exactly as described and with a cute Mickey Mouse bag
customer_reviews.author: Monica arango

customer_reviews.title: These were better than, I thought they would be - my ...
customer_reviews.text: These were better than , I thought they would be - my 2 year loves them
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Mickey's gang
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice. The tote bag is too small to fit all 6 in.
customer_reviews.author: Della

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness overload
customer_reviews.text: The characters did look real. It is a gift for a 2 and a half year old girl.
customer_reviews.author: marlene brown

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set! It was such good quality and my daughter loves them all!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great item, my granddaughter will love it for her 2nd birthday.
customer_reviews.author: arthur kogos

customer_reviews.title: Stuff Mickey, Minnie, Minnie, Pluto, Donald, and Goffy
customer_reviews.text: I was every disappointed with this, the Daisy stuff animal was not with the others, I got two Minnie's. Now I will have to order the Daisy stuff animal for my grandson for his birthday. I do not think this order should had been shipped until a Daisy was also ready or had been made.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Harless

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loved her full collection of Mickey Mouse and friends and they are super cute and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Franco Hansen

product_meta.title: Disney 11" Plush Mickey Minnie Mouse Donald Daisy Duck Goofy Pluto 6-Pack in Gift Bag
product_meta.description: Disney Gang bean plush 6 pack - officially licensed. Includes Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, Daisy Duck, Goofy, and Pluto. Characters vary in size, but are approximately 10" - 11" tall from the bottom of their feet to the top of their ears/bows/hats. Pluto is the shortest, because he is sitting, at about 8". When the dolls are sitting they are about 8" high. This set includes a large gift/tote bag to carry these Clubhouse friends.
feature_bullets: Disney Gang Bean-Plush/Stuffed-Animal 6 Pack in Gift Bag
Includes 6 plush toys total - one each of: Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, Daisy Duck, Goofy and Pluto
Characters vary in size, but measures approximately 10" to 11" tall from bottom of their feet to the top of their ears/bows/hat (Pluto is the shortest and is only about 8" tall)
Plush characters are recommended for ages 2+

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
